title: If the area under reservation in development plan is more than the area required for public amenity space as per this regulation, then the area for public amenity space shall be provided equal to area required under this regulation
clause_text: If the area under reservation in development plan is more than the area required for public amenity space as per this regulation, then the area for public amenity space shall be provided equal to area required under this regulation.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
